content: using two strands of cotton yarn held together in your own color combo quickly create your own eco plant coaster there are three sizes available small medium and large a great accessory for the plant loving person in your life upon finishing the eco plant coaster i d love to see what you ve created be sure to use the hashtag #ecomindedstitches and tag me @eco minded stitches on instagram questions or comments ecomindedstitches@gmail com to ensure that you have the best version of my pattern available all my patterns have been tested by experienced pattern testers as well as pattern designers refund policy due to the nature of pdf sales i am not able to issue a refund once the pattern has been downloaded i am an email or message away if you have any questions regarding the pattern <3 let s keep in touch <3 instagram https //www instagram com/eco minded stitches/ facebook https //www facebook com/ecomindedstitches/ copyright information ©2021 krystal amador all rights reserved this pattern is for personal use you may not alter sell copy transfer trade or distribute this pattern or its images you may not claim this pattern as your own you are welcome to sell items created from this pattern but please credit eco-minded stitches or krystal amador as the pattern designer thank you for supporting my small business
